title: Pentagame Dojo
subtitle: Just playin'
description:
Just playing Pentagame
Pentagame is a fun abstract board game2 players take ca. 20 minutes (well depends, on how long you think about it)3 players take maybe 40 minutes (beginner games are often shorter)4 players take some 45 minutes (unless you're pros and play in 2 teams of 2 players - that can take a while)The rules can be explained in less than a minute and are available on the big inter net in a number of languages.
